segments.text: Not really , but I know it is very popular a traditional Chinese gambling game .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , some friends play it all day , all night , and sometimes a whole weekend . I tried to read about some basic rules online , but it is hard to understand . So I went to watch people play yesterday only to find I was even more confused . I think I have to work hard on those rules and more learning by doing . Practice makes the master .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Typical Francis , whether you are at work , or engaged in leisure time activities , you always show the same eagerness and curiosity to learn something new and improve yourself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is important to keep your mind up-to-date and active .
segments.speaker: S1
